faq.q: Who is going to be my POC during the process?
faq.a: The person who's going to follow your process and maintain regular contact with you, depends on the process. Renato is in charge of CRO clients and Inês is in charge of SMM clients.

faq.q: Do you offer free consultation or audits before starting a project?
faq.a: When you jump on a call with us, we can make a high-level audit about your specific situation if we see that's needed. But if you need a deep audit and a comprehensive report you will have to buy our services.

faq.q: What kind of support or maintenance do you offer post-implementation of CRO strategies or Social Media Management?
faq.a: Unfortanelly, we can only provide maintenance or customized support as long as we are providing the services to you. That's why we have monthly on-going services. But you can always count on Renato and Inês for business advice or any question you may have on the future.

faq.q: What makes Modern Tips's CRO services unique?
faq.a: Modern Tips stands out by offering personalized CRO solutions crafted by our experienced team. We don't rely on generic templates but tailor our approach to meet the specific needs of your brand.

faq.q: How can CRO services from Modern Tips benefit my business?
faq.a: Our CRO services can significantly boost your website's conversion rates, translating into increased revenue without the need for additional ad spending. It's a strategic investment in maximizing your online potential.

faq.q: How do you ensure results for clients?
faq.a: With each team member boasting +7 years of expertise in design or technology, Modern Tips guarantees results through a meticulous process involving audits, top-notch design, and ongoing optimizations based on data-backed insights.

faq.q: Can I see examples of CRO success on Modern Tips?
faq.a: Explore our Example Works section to witness firsthand how Modern Tips has helped clients achieve remarkable increases in conversion rates, revenue generation, and overall online success.

faq.q: Does Modern Tips specialize in a particular industry?
faq.a: While many clients are from E-Commerce and SaaS sectors, Modern Tips's adaptable solutions cater to businesses from any industry or background. We understand the uniqueness of each brand.

faq.q: What's included in the CRO Audit and Report from Modern Tips?
faq.a: For $499, you'll receive a personalized report with recommendations and a video briefing from our analysts. Understand your website analytics and discover actionable steps to boost your conversion rates.

faq.q: How does Modern Tips handle Landing Page Design and Development?
faq.a: Starting from $2499, our team creates hyper-converting landing pages tailored to your niche. Whether launching a product or an entire E-commerce store, our unlimited revisions ensure satisfaction.

faq.q: Tell me more about the On-Going Optimization service at Modern Tips.
faq.a: Our comprehensive package includes monthly audits, designs, and split tests. We guarantee a minimum 30% increase in conversion rates within the first 90 days or your money back, showcasing our commitment to ongoing success.

faq.q: What's the process for booking services with Modern Tips?
faq.a: Simplified! Choose your preferred solution, book a free meeting to discuss expectations, let our team deliver tailored strategies, and witness the impact on your conversion rates.

faq.q: How do I get started with Modern Tips's CRO services?
faq.a: Visit our Contact page, book a free call, and let's kickstart the journey of elevating your conversion rates and enhancing your online presence with Modern Tips's expert CRO services. We look forward to collaborating with you!

faq.q: How does Modern Tips ensure that CRO strategies align with my brand's unique identity?
faq.a: At Modern Tips, we pride ourselves on a collaborative approach. Our team takes the time to understand your brand's unique identity, values, and goals, ensuring that our CRO strategies not only boost conversion rates but also resonate with your brand.

faq.q: Can Modern Tips integrate CRO strategies seamlessly with my existing website design?
faq.a: Yes, our team excels at seamless integration. Whether your website is an established platform or a recent launch, Modern Tips ensures that CRO strategies complement your existing design, providing a cohesive and engaging user experience.

faq.q: How does ongoing communication work throughout the CRO process?
faq.a: Communication is key. Modern Tips maintains transparent and regular communication channels. We provide updates on progress, discuss insights, and welcome your feedback throughout the entire CRO process to ensure a collaborative and effective partnership.

faq.q: Are Modern Tips's CRO services suitable for businesses of all sizes?
faq.a: Absolutely. While we have successfully worked with major E-Commerce and SaaS brands, Modern Tips's scalable solutions are tailored to businesses of all sizes. Our goal is to empower every business, regardless of scale, to achieve optimal conversion rates.

faq.q: What sets Modern Tips apart from other CRO service providers?
faq.a: Modern Tips distinguishes itself through a combination of personalized strategies, a dedicated team with extensive expertise, and a commitment to tangible results. Our client-centric approach ensures that your success is at the forefront of everything we do.
